00049 <script>
00050 $.extend({
00051   getUrlVars: function(){
00052     var vars = [], hash;
00053     var hashes = window.location.href.slice(window.location.href.indexOf('?') + 1).split('&');
00054     for(var i = 0; i < hashes.length; i++)
00055     {
00056       hash = hashes[i].split('=');
00057       vars.push(hash[0]);
00058       vars[hash[0]] = hash[1];
00059     }
00060     return vars;
00061   },
00062   getUrlVar: function(name){
00063     return $.getUrlVars()[name];
00064   }
00065 });
00066 </script>
